name: Colosseum Stellarum
description:
Colossum Stellarum is a two player fighting game. You and your opponent fight for the glory of the gods and compete for the title of Celestial Champion. Colosseum Stellarum was created in 48 hours at the LSU Women in Computer Science Game Jam.

parallaxvisions.com

Player 1
W , A , S , D - Move
C- Punch
V- Kick
B- Counter

Player 2
Arrow Keys - Move
I- Punch
O- Kick
P- Counter
